mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) < 10 THEN '10세 미만' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN '60대' ELSE '70세 이상' END AS ageRange, COUNT(*) AS count FROM MEMBER GROUP BY CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) < 10 THEN '10세 미만' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MEMBER_BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN '60대' ELSE '70세 이상' END ORDER BY ageRange
